segments.text: I’m struck by the contrasting calm outside and the chaos brewing inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks peaceful, almost mocking the turmoil here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman drying her plate, blissfully unaware of the water spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s astonishing how one person can be so caught up in their own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is a precarious sight—what if he falls?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is so eager, her hand raised, waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope someone notices the mess before something goes horribly wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
